attributes.action: All MP's who are Freemasons should say so when joining Paliment.
attributes.additional_details: At present several people who hold positions of power in the U.K have to say if they are a member of the 'secret' society the Freemasons including Judges. MP's hold a lot of power over many decisions made in our country and if they have even the slightest hint of an agenda that is clearly wrong. But on a basic level if judges have to make it known then surely MP's should too.
